channel.title: Sls on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sls on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Rocket Report: European rocket reuse test delayed; NASA tweaks SLS for Artemis II
item.description: “There’s a lot of interest because of the fear that there’s just not a lot of capacity.”

item.title: Congress and Trump may compromise on the SLS rocket by axing its costly upper stage
item.description: “At $4 billion a launch, you don’t have a Moon program.”

item.title: NASA’s acting chief “angry” about talk that China will beat US back to the Moon
item.description: “I can tell you what, I’ll be damned if that is the story that we write.”

item.title: Rocket Report: Neutron’s pad opens for business; SpaceX gets Falcon 9 green light
item.description: “Nobody’s waving the white flag here until the last hour of the last day.”
